Docs.summary: Specifies the border styles for a form.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class. It represents the different styles of the form. The default style is `Sizable`.
## Examples In this example, you change the form border style to `Fixed3d` and display the border's information using a label. This example assumes that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
